All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BankAccount_S2023_Group6
Bank Account Class
- Contains constructor, getters, and setters for Bank Account
- Superclass
CheckingAccount_S2023_Group6
Checking Account Class
- Extends Bank Account Class
- Contains constructor for Checking Account
- Contains methods for depositing and withdrawing funds, as well as charging fees
CheckingAccountJunitTest
JUnit Testing for Checking Account Class
DoubleValidiationException
Double Validation Exception
- Exception is thrown when the required user input is not a double
- Extends Exception superclass
- Secure Software Design Decision
Extensions
Extensions Class
- Responsible for validating input and perfoming cryptographic constructions throughout the application
- Contains methods for validating each data type used in the application
- Contains method for generating a random account number
- Contains methods for encrypting and decrypting a given String
- Contains method for generating an AES key for encryption and decryption based on the user password
InvalidInputException
Invalid Input Exception
- Exception is thrown when the user input is invalid
- Extends Exception superclass
- Secure Software Design Decision
LargeDepositException
Large Deposit Exception
- As per Bank policy: Exception is thrown when a deposit into a Checking or Savings Account exceeds $1,000,000
- Extends Exception superclass
- Secure Software Design Decision
Main
Main Class
- Houses the UI
- Responsible for saving and loading data
- Responsible for all encryption/decryption of saved data
NegativeBalanceException
Negative Balance Exception
- As per Bank Policy: Exception is thrown when the account balance of a Checking or Savings Account is negative
- Extends Exception superclass
- Secure Software Design Decision
SavingsAccount_S2023_Group6
Savings Account Class
- Extends Bank Account Class
- Contains constructor for Savings Account
- Contains methods for depositing and withdrawing funds, as well as charging fees
SavingsAccountJunitTest
JUnit Testing for Savings Account Class
TestBankAccount1
Static Test 1
TestBankAccount2
Static Test 2

Static Test 3
TestBankAccount4
Static Test 4
TestBankAccount5
Static Test 5
TestBankAccount6
Static Test 6
ValidationJunitTest
JUnit Testing for Input Validation
